Class Moves2

java.lang.Object

public class Moves2 extends Object
This is from a problem in LeetCode: 780 Reaching Points (Hard)

  • Method Details

    • move

      public Point move(Point p, boolean which)
      This method defines the possible moves from point p
      Parameters:
      p - the point
      which - determines which of two possible moves we want.
      Returns:
      the point we moved to

    • valid

      public boolean valid(int x, int y)
      Determines if it is possible to reach a target point from a starting point by a series of moves. This implementation uses a queue-based approach to perform a breadth-first check.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the starting point
      y - the y-coordinate of the starting point
      Returns:
      true if the target point can be reached, otherwise false
